## readPkg() function

Reads the content of a `package.json` file

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function readPkg(fileName: string): Pkg;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fileName | string | The name of the <code>package.json</code> file to read |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Pkg](./core.pkg.md)

Package information [PkgInfo](./core.pkginfo.md)
